content: this is a basic pattern for those of you who are beginner level a free version of this pattern can be found on my blog here 1 you can also shop the pattern here 2 description this is a basic pattern for those of you who are beginner level and the techniques you will need to know are casting on casting off the knit stitch the purl stitch decreasing through k2tog and p2tog this baby hat is knit flat with straight needles and later seamed to finish yarn 1 x ball of dk baby yarn - 50g/165m/179yds any dk/light worsted/8-ply yarn needles 4 mm us 6 knitting needles skills level basic this is a basic level knitting pattern and the techniques involved are the knit stitch purl stitch increasing and decreasing sizing this pattern is to fit baby size 0-3 months / 3-6 months / 6-9 months don t forget to follow handy little me on social media for more updates and to share your finished projects instagram @handylittleme facebook facebook com/handylittleme ravelry ravelry com/people/handylittleme pinterest pinterest co uk/handylittleme copyright the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of handy little me this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern or any items created using the directions in this pattern without consent please visit my terms of use page for additional information 1 https //www handylittleme com/flat-knit-baby-hat-pattern/ 2 https //www handylittleme com/product/flat-knit-baby-hat-pattern/
